description:
The following files are in the repo but not in the tarballs:

-HACKING.rst
-nova/openstack/common/README
-nova/testing/README.rst
-nova/tests/test_migrations.conf
-openstack-common.conf
-tox.ini
title: Missing files in generated tarballs

comments.content:

-HACKING.rst

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Side-effect: tests from tarballs fail with:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_walk_versions (nova.tests.test_migrations.TestMigrations)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/tmp/buildd/nova-2012.1~e4~20120224.12913/nova/tests/test_migrations.py", line 77, in setUp
    self.fail("Failed to find test_migrations.conf config "
AssertionError: Failed to find test_migrations.conf config file.
-------------------- >> begin captured logging << --------------------
nova.tests.test_migrations: DEBUG: config_path is test_migrations.conf
--------------------- >> end captured logging << ---------------------
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
